name: BreastRadMammoCalcificationDistribution
title: Mammo Calcification Distribution
description:
Breast Radiology Mammography Calcification Distribution Observation

This resource describes the calcification distribution observed.


These descriptors are used to indicate the arrangement of calcifications in the breast. Multiple
similar groups may be described in the report when there is more than one group of calcifications
that are similar in morphology and distribution. In evaluating the likelihood of malignancy for calcifications, 
distribution is at least as important as morphology.
-- Bi-Rads® Atlas — Mammography Fifth Ed. 2013
